channel.title: go on Kassian Sun
channel.description: Recent content in go on Kassian Sun

item.title: Go Source Code, Part 1
item.description: Set Up the Environment vim-go doesn’t support travesal through the go source code, so I switch to vscode and it works out of box (with Go plugin && gopls installed). Start Point (go run) File: src/cmd/go/main.go Declaration: run.CmdRun Function: run.runRun Key data structures: build.Context work.Builder load.Package work.Action The runRun function will go through several stages: Check shouldUseOutsideModuleMode. This procedure is used by go run cmd@version work.BuildInit. This will setup the build context: Initialize modload module.
